title: shrI abhayAmbA ninnu cintincinavAriki (mp)
sahitya:
P:   shrI abhayAmbA ninnu cintincinavAriki inda kavalai ellAm tIrumammA A:  hE abhayakarE varE Ishvari krpatOnu endanai rakSikka idu nalla samayam ammA caraNam    nI atyadbhuta shubha guNamulu vini nIvE dikkani nera nammiti
nIrajAkSi nija rUpa sAkSi nityAnanda guruguha kaTAkSi rakSi
